channel.title: Posts on Jin Long Cao's Statistical Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jin Long Cao's Statistical Blog

item.title: Will Toronto's Crime Rate Ever Decrease?
item.description: Jin Long Cao Abstract Toronto is a highly populated location which means it’s crime rate will also be high. But will Toronto’s crime rate ever lower? In this paper we explore opendatatoronto’s dataset on “Neighbourhood Crime Rates”. We find that as Toronto’s population increase, the crime rate will increase with it. Introduction There are 2,731,571 total people living in neighbourhoods around Toronto in 2019, with that total number increasing every year.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.
